text: So what's the problem? This is correct according to the manifest specification.

text:
Just curious to know if you have tried the same thing with JDK's jar executable.
FYI.  It does the same thing that Ant does - except that the Created-By 
attribute is different:

Manifest-Version: 1.0
Created-By: 1.3.0_02 (Sun Microsystems Inc.)
Class-Path: HSDServerAPI.jar HSDServerRMI.jar jaxp.jar jcchartK.jar jc
 field450K.jar jcpagelayoutK.jar jctableK.jar jhall.jar

Furthermore, Ant behaves according to specifications.  

Marking this as invalid.
